title: Green anti-solvent engineering for high-efficiency and environmentally friendly perovskite solar cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32370-32388
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05082G, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yuwen Yang, Zhaolong Huang, Hao Gao, Zicong Xu, Weihong Fang, Yichuan Chen, Yuehui Hu, Zhijie Yi, Jiayu Huang, Hua Zhu
The outstanding research achievements on green anti-solvents in recent years are summarized. Additionally, five non-anti-solvent green preparation methods prescribed by physical processes are also included.
